all_things_in_murderation

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • all_things_in_murderation.Player
      • all_things_in_murderation.Mob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class Mob
extends Player
implements java.util.Observer, java.lang.Runnable
    Main Mob class. Extends the Player class and implements Observer and Runnable. Has a Hashtable for the dialogue Has the Game Has an ArrayList of direction Has three Boolean values if they can walk around the game,whether they're talking to the Player, and if they're the antagonist Has a "kill timer" so that if they're the antagonist then when it runs out the game is over
    Author:
    Nodar Sotkilava, Hal Stewart, Emily Pochet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mob(Room r, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Boolean run, Game g, java.lang.Boolean f)
      Uses Player's constructor, on top lists of all possible directions are added And whether they can run

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add_dialogue(int i, java.lang.String s)
      Adds the dialogue to a hashtable
      java.lang.String get_dialogue()
      Gets the appropriate dialogue for the appropriate Mob
      Item get_item(java.lang.String s)
      Overrides the Player's get_item method.
      void go()
      A simple function for the mob to walk in the game If the mob is allowed to walk and if they are not talking to the Player Then they can move to another room Print statements are added for debugging and testing
      void negate_talk()
      Negates the talk boolean
      void run()
      Checks if the Mob is allowed to walk if so go() method is called If not then they stay in their starting rooms
      java.lang.Boolean talking()
      Returns the talk boolean True if the Mob is talking to the Player False if the Mob is not talking to the Player
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      When the game is finished, all Mobs are not allowed to move
